translation: The dog MUST not be in the house.

It should be raining in Scotland.
Mary SHOULD be at home
Mary SHOULD be at home
He might be at school today.

translation: The cat MAY be inside or the cat MAY also be outside.
Daniel MAY go to New York.
Mary may not be at home.

It CAN’T be in the third box.
You MUST wear a helmet.

translation: Visitors MUST leave by 6pm.

gloss: DEF 	PL 	customers 	also 	be-MOD-3 	POSS 	wash.hands-AL
translation: Non-employees OUGHT TO wash their hands too!
I OUGHT TO wear a face covering.
Martin MAY ride the ferris wheel.
You MAY enter.
You can stay overnight and you can go home.
Alice CAN lift her baby.
Isabel COULD go swimming.
I don't have to wear formal clothes.
I don't have to wear a mask.
You MUST NOT ride a motor bike without a helmet.
Visitors MUST NOT stay after 6pm.

translation: You HAVE TO take this road.
Chile has to beat Brazil.
We have to go to Napoli to eat the best pizza.
You should take the bus.
You SHOULD go via the smaller roads.

you CAN’T take another road.
